statements: SELECT fan_name, fan_email FROM FanEngagement WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM FanEngagement WHERE fan_id = 5;
SELECT fan_name, fan_email, feedback FROM FanEngagement WHERE fan_preference = 'VIP';
SELECT fan_name, fan_email, fan_preference, loyalty_points FROM FanEngagement ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, fan_email, fan_preference, feedback, loyalty_points FROM FanEngagement WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, fan_email FROM FanEngagement WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM FanEngagement WHERE fan_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT AVG(loyalty_points) AS avg_points FROM FanEngagement WHERE loyalty_points < 50;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, feedback FROM FanEngagement WHERE fan_preference = 'Music' OR fan_preference = 'Sports';
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, feedback FROM FanEngagement WHERE fan_email IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM FanPreferences;
SELECT fan_id, favorite_color FROM FanPreferences;
SELECT favorite_team FROM FanPreferences WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT fan_id, favorite_team, favorite_color FROM FanPreferences ORDER BY favorite_team DESC;
SELECT * FROM FanFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM FanPreferences WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT favorite_team, favorite_player FROM FanPreferences WHERE favorite_color = 'Blue';
SELECT fan_id, favorite_team FROM FanPreferences WHERE favorite_color = 'Red' ORDER BY favorite_team DESC;
SELECT fan_id, favorite_color FROM FanPreferences WHERE favorite_color LIKE 'G%' ORDER BY fan_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM FanFeedback WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM fan_preferences;
SELECT fan_id, preference FROM fan_preferences ORDER BY preference ASC;
SELECT fan_id, preference FROM fan_preferences WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback;
SELECT * FROM fan_preferences WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, fan_id FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, benefits FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_id > 100 ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT fan_id, COUNT(*) AS total_preferences FROM fan_preferences GROUP BY fan_id HAVING total_preferences > 3;
SELECT fan_id, preference FROM fan_preferences JOIN loyalty_programs ON fan_preferences.fan_id = loyalty_programs.program_id WHERE program_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY fan_id ASC, preference DESC;
SELECT * FROM fan_preferences;
SELECT fan_id, favorite_team FROM fan_preferences WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, discount FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount > 0.1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM fan_engagement ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fan_preferences ORDER BY fan_id DESC;
SELECT favorite_player, favorite_team FROM fan_preferences WHERE favorite_team = 'Barcelona';
SELECT fan_id, favorite_player FROM fan_preferences WHERE favorite_team = 'Real Madrid' AND favorite_player LIKE '%Messi%';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE discount >= 0.1 ORDER BY discount DESC;
SELECT * FROM FanEngagement;
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, fan_email FROM FanEngagement WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT fan_name, fan_address FROM FanEngagement ORDER BY fan_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FanFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT fan_name, program_name FROM FanEngagement e JOIN ProgramMembers m ON e.fan_id = m.fan_id JOIN LoyaltyPrograms p ON m.program_id = p.program_id;
SELECT fan_name, fan_email FROM FanEngagement;
SELECT * FROM FanPreferences WHERE fan_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, feedback_date FROM FanFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT program_name, program_start_date, program_end_date FROM LoyaltyPrograms ORDER BY program_start_date DESC;

SELECT f.fan_name, p.program_name, pm.join_date FROM FanEngagement f JOIN ProgramMembers pm ON f.fan_id = pm.fan_id JOIN LoyaltyPrograms p ON pm.program_id = p.program_id WHERE pm.join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
